ruleContent.content:
<js>
while(src.match(/访问太频繁了，奴家受不了啦/)){
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(10000)
	src=java.ajax(baseUrl)
	}
result=java.getString(".content@html",src)
result
</js>

}result;

searchUrl:
<js>
cookie.removeCookie(source.getKey());
url = "https://m.bxetv.com/api/search";
r = java.ajax(baseUrl);
s = r.match(/var\s\w+\s*=\s*"\w+";/g).join('');
eval(s);
var bd = {
  "method": "POST",
  "body": `q=${key}&vw=${vw}&abw=${abw}&ru=${ru}&jrt=${jrt}&van=${van}&fw=${fw}&cwl=${cwl}&gpr=${gpr}&uyoo=${uyoo}&tz=${tz}&euu=${euu}&tsn=${tsn}&eju=${eju}&um=${um}&fp=${fp}&dvm=${dvm}&jpk=${jpk}&deblkx=${deblkx}&ht=${ht}&azy=${azy}&sna=${sna}&wqx=${wqx}&fpp=${fpp}&rup=${rup}&jwj=${jwj}&bgt=${bgt}&qp=${qp}&yf=${yf}&cw=${cw}&wq=${wq}&sign=${sign}`
};

bjson = JSON.stringify(bd);
url + ',' + bjson;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
$=java.getString('.leftx@html')
n = 0; 
v = book.getVariable("custom");
x = v.match(/^\d+$/)? v : n;
//x = (parseInt(x) < $.length)? x : n;
java.toast(x)
name=java.getString('.bookTitle@text');
author=`{{book.author}}`;
last=java.getString('#list-chapterAll@a@text')
kind=java.getString('.col-md-12@p.1@text')

if (v == 0) {
  bookUrlz = baseUrl;
  book.type = 8;
  java.toast('已自动开启小说模式');
} else if(v==1){
  bookUrlz =String(java.getString('.leftx@a@onclick')).replace(/.*\(\'(.*?)\'\)/,'$1');
  book.type = 128;
  java.toast('已自动开启文件模式');
}
intro = " 简介：" + java.getString('.bookIntro@text') + "\n当前源链: " + "\n"+bookUrlz+"\n书籍文本:🔺'+【0】+'🔻"+'\n'+baseUrl+
"\n文件链接:🔺'+【1】+'🔻"+'\n'+String(java.getString('.leftx@a@onclick')).replace(/.*\(\'(.*?)\'\)/,'$1');
data = {
	name:name,
	author:author,
	last:last,
	kind:kind,
	intro:intro,
	bookUrl:bookUrlz
};

JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name##\《|》.*

ruleContent.content:
<js>
match=result.match(/d\(".+"[^"]+".+"\)/)
function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
$ = java.getString(".infoWen@html");
n = 0; 
v = String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x = v.match(/^\d+$/)? v : n;
x = parseInt(x) < $.length? x : n;
java.toast(x);

img = java.getString('[property="og:image"]@content');

if (v == 1) {
  bookUrlz = java.getString('source@src');
} else if(v==0){
  bookUrlz = baseUrl;
}

intro = "  简介：" + java.getString('[property="og:description"]@content') + "\n当前源链: " + bookUrlz+"\n文本简介:🔺'+0+'🔻"+baseUrl+
"\n音频链接:🔺'+1+'🔻"+java.getString('source@src');
data = {
  intro: intro,
  img: img,
  bookUrl: bookUrlz
};

JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let list = [];
if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
  book.type = 32;
  java.toast('已自动开启听书模式');
} else if (baseUrl.match(/huiben/)) {
  book.type = 64;
  java.toast('已自动开启漫画模式');
} else if (baseUrl.match(/g/)) {
  book.type = 8;
  java.toast('已自动开启小说模式');
}
let obj = {
  text: java.get('name'), 
  href:baseUrl
};
list.push(obj);
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
function d(a, b) {
            b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString();
            var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16));
            var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16));
            return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8)
        }
match=src.match(/\.html\((d.*?"\))/);
//java.log(match[1])
if(match){
result=eval(match[1])}else result
</js>
